mapper.select: SELECT user_id FROM participant WHERE target_id = #{projectId} AND target_type = 'PROJECT' AND role_id = 1
SELECT user_id FROM participant WHERE target_id = #{detailParticipantId} AND target_type = 'DETAILED'
SELECT p.user_id FROM relation r JOIN participant p ON r.next_work_id = p.target_id WHERE r.prev_work_id = #{taskId} AND p.target_type = 'TASK'
SELECT user_id FROM participant WHERE target_type = 'PROJECT' AND target_id = #{project_id}
SELECT b.dept_name AS deptName , COUNT(a.id) AS participantCount FROM participant a JOIN user b ON a.user_id = b.id WHERE a.target_type = 'PROJECT' AND a.target_id = #{projectId} GROUP BY b.dept_name

SELECT a.id , a.user_id , b.name , b.dept_name , b.profile_image , b.job_rank_name FROM participant a JOIN user b ON a.user_id = b.id WHERE a.target_type = 'PROJECT' AND a.target_id = #{projectId} AND a.role_id = 2

SELECT a.user_id , b.name , b.dept_name , b.profile_image , b.job_rank_name , a.role_id FROM participant a JOIN user b ON a.user_id = b.id WHERE a.target_type = 'PROJECT' AND a.target_id = #{projectId} AND b.dept_name = #{deptName}
